title: Manoharam Ruby and Diamond Jhumka Earrings - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine. Features a central pear-shaped Ruby (approx. 3 carats) with excellent clarity and rich color. Accented with round-cut Rubies and Emeralds. Polki diamonds (uncut diamonds) are meticulously set in a pave setting
features: These Jhumkas showcase a delicate floral design, blending traditional South Indian motifs with a modern aesthetic. The intricate gold filigree work adds depth and texture. The cascading Polki diamonds create a graceful, dangling effect. The design takes inspiration from nature with leaves and floral elements, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans.
colors: The color palette is a classic South Indian combination of deep red Ruby
and the warm glow of 22K gold. The white sparkle of Polki diamonds provides a beautiful contrast.
occasions: and special occasions. A striking choice for a Bride's jewelry collection or for adding a touch of elegance to any ensemble. Suitable for events like Muhurtham
description: A unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality gemstones and meticulous detailing ensures both beauty and lasting value. The rich cultural significance and timeless appeal make it a cherished heirloom piece. Made with Hyderabadi craftsmanship with intricate detail, a cultural symbol. The uncut diamond adds a vintage royal vibe.
